message.msgstr: On this page, you could configure ACL enable/disable, and enabled rules.

ACL-enabled before configureing rules. You can click on the button to add rules, delete rules after the selected row or full delete, or modify the rule after you selected a row. Finally, please click the submit button to submit all your configuration.
Delete All
ACL Enable
ACL Mode
ACL Type
ACL Rules List
(Each port can create up to eight rules)
(Decimal format, such as 10.10.10.2)
(You can input alphanumeric and ':', such as 00:24:21:19:BD:E4)
You can configure 32 rules at most!
has created 8 rules! No more rule can be created!
Repeat with the existing rules. Please reconfigure it!
At present there is no rule, so you can not delete!
Please choose a rule at least!
Please input IP!
Please input a valid IP!
Please input MAC!
MAC address format is incorrect! MAC format 00:24:21:19:BD:E4
Valid vlan ID range is 1 to 4095.
Please input positive integer.
Are you sure to delete the selected rules?
It will remove the original rules to change ACL type, are you sure to continue?
